titles.title: A bill to reduce the Federal budget deficit and encourage energy conservation through an increase in the motor fuels excise tax, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S6859-6863)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/28/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the gasoline deficit reduction rate and the diesel fuel deficit reduction rate by ten cents a gallon beginning after December 31, 1993, and ending before January 1, 1999. Increases the earned income credit and includes families without qualifying children.
